title: MA Typeface Design
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : MA Typeface Design**

One-year postgraduate course taught at the [Department of Typography & Graphic Communication](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/www.reading.ac.uk/typography/), [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Reading), UK  
Teachers (past & present): [Gerry Leonidas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gerry%20Leonidas), [Gerard Unger](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gerard%20Unger), [Fiona Ross](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fiona%20Ross), [Victor Gaultney](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Victor%20Gaultney), [Thomas Phinney](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Phinney), [Sumner Stone](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sumner%20Stone), [Peter Bilak](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Bi%C4%BEak), [František Štorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Franti%C5%A1ek%20%C5%A0torm), [Albert-Jan Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Albert-Jan%20Pool), [Fred Smeijers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fred%20Smeijers), [John Downer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414203312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Downer)
